item.title: CVE-2021-43308|2024-09-16T17:28:35.115Z -- markdown-link-extractor -- markdown-link-extractor
item.description: An exponential ReDoS (Regular Expression Denial of Service) can be triggered in the markdown-link-extractor npm package, when an attacker is able to supply arbitrary input to the module's exported function
